tweet: FutureProof - our 1st webinar dedicated to enterprises is tomorrow at 4PM CET! Dominik Schiener, our cofounder, will explain why #DLT, #IoT and #IOTA enable new business models. We’ve switched the platform to allow a broader audience to join. Sign up:  https://t.co/s0y4kygyGE

In the hands-on initiative of this week of the #IOTACommunity Projects, we show how to use a smart wireless switch device to IOTA-based applications such as #IOTA-based payment, energy source tracking, malfunction detection & preventive maintenance.  https://t.co/HUZdh0r1UN  https://t.co/Xs8QDVdYBo

My team #BiiLabs is working on the #CarWallet x #DLT #IOTA inside. The HW now I am choosing is #SierraWireless which can support 4G-Cat1, #TrustZone & a Cortex A7 inside. Very good for the #Mobility  https://t.co/f56RppSwYU
